title-group.article-title: A Collocation-$H^{-1}$-Galerkin Method for Some Elliptic Equations

abstract.p: A collocation-$H^{-1}$-Galerkin method is defined for some elliptic boundary value problems on a rectangle. The method uses tensor products of discontinuous piecewise polynomial spaces and collocation based on Jacobi points with weight function $x^2(1 - x)^2$. Optimal order of $L^2$ rates of convergence is established for the approximation solution. A numerical example which confirms these results is presented.
